name: iottySmartHomePLUS
0:
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen Light”
”Alexa, turn off Kitchen Light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To control iotty devices through Alexa, you must have one or more iotty devices installed.

From https://iotty.com/pages/choose-the-country, you can find stores with FAQs explaining how to install iotty devices.

Then, the iotty devices must be registered on the app (available for Android and iOS). You can then use your iotty login credentials (email and password) to complete the Alexa account linking phase

- iotty Smart Home webpage: http://www.iotty.com/
- iotty App for Android is available on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dynamicait.iotty
- iotty app for iOS is availabe on Apple Store: https://itunes.apple.com/ca/app/iotty-smart-home/id1230937401?mt=8
